title: Urgent How to get management seat
content: Someone please reply i'm in a huge pickle here

comments.body: go to rr campus and discuss with management

Easy 3-step process: 

1. Visit any campus of your choice
2. Head into the office of anyone from the management
3. Grab their chair

You now have a management seat!
All management seats are over btw
